channel.title: Judge Lets Drunk Driver Off, Gets Hit by Him 11 Years Later
channel.description:
http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2010/06/08/AR2010060805058.html
A drunk driver was sentenced to 18 months in jail Tuesday for a crash in Gaithersburg that injured a retired judge who, 11 years earlier in a different drunken-driving case, had spared the man jail time. Rene Fernandez, 45, will serve his time at the Montgomery County jail and likely be released in 13 to 15 months, prosecutors said.
the irony is hilarious

item.title: Judge Lets Drunk Driver Off, Gets Hit by Him 11 Years Later
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:2, topic:343512”]This will be my new analogy for explaining irony to idiots who say “irony LOL” about things that are not in fact ironic in any way.[/quote]It was ironic that the judge decided to let him go without punishment because he probably trusted he would’ve learned, while in reality he didn’t learn shit, got drunk and fucked up bad.

Read full topic
item.source: Judge Lets Drunk Driver Off, Gets Hit by Him 11 Years Later

item.description:
@lawl wrote:

Unhandled:

This will be my new analogy for explaining irony to idiots who say “irony LOL” about things that are not in fact ironic in any way.

protip: irony has several definitions

for example: ironic - Both coincidental and contradictory in a humorous or poignant and extremely improbable way
